verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> in the sixth<WH8345> year,<WH8141> in the sixth<WH8345> month, in the fifth<WH2568> day of the month,<WH2320> as I<WH589> sat<WH3427> in mine house,<WH1004> and the elders<WH2205> of Judah<WH3063> sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> me, that the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> fell<WH5307> there<WH8033> upon<WH5921> me.

Then I beheld,<WH7200> and lo<WH2009> a likeness<WH1823> as the appearance<WH4758> of fire:<WH784> from the appearance<WH4480> <WH4758> of his loins<WH4975> even downward,<WH4295> fire;<WH784> and from his loins<WH4480> <WH4975> even upward,<WH4605> as the appearance<WH4758> of brightness,<WH2096> as the color<WH5869> of amber.<WH2830>

And he put forth<WH7971> the form<WH8403> of a hand,<WH3027> and took<WH3947> me by a lock<WH6734> of mine head;<WH7218> and the spirit<WH7307> lifted me up<WH5375> <WH853> between<WH996> the earth<WH776> and the heaven,<WH8064> and brought<WH935> me in the visions<WH4759> of God<WH430> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> to<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the inner<WH6442> gate<WH8179> that looketh<WH6437> toward the north;<WH6828> where<WH834> <WH8033> was the seat<WH4186> of the image<WH5566> of jealousy,<WH7068> which provoketh to jealousy.<WH7065>
And, behold,<WH2009> the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was there,<WH8033> according to the vision<WH4758> that<WH834> I saw<WH7200> in the plain.<WH1237>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> lift up<WH5375> thine eyes<WH5869> now<WH4994> the way<WH1870> toward the north.<WH6828> So I lifted up<WH5375> mine eyes<WH5869> the way<WH1870> toward the north,<WH6828> and behold<WH2009> northward<WH4480> <WH6828> at the gate<WH8179> of the altar<WH4196> this<WH2088> image<WH5566> of jealousy<WH7068> in the entry.<WH872>

He said<WH559> furthermore unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> seest<WH7200> thou<WH859> what<WH4100> they<WH1992> do?<WH6213> even the great<WH1419> abominations<WH8441> that<WH834> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> committeth<WH6213> here,<WH6311> that I should go far off<WH7368> from<WH4480> <WH5921> my sanctuary?<WH4720> but turn thee yet again,<WH7725> <WH5750> and thou shalt see<WH7200> greater<WH1419> abominations.<WH8441>
And he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the court;<WH2691> and when I looked,<WH7200> behold<WH2009> a<WH259> hole<WH2356> in the wall.<WH7023>
Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> dig<WH2864> now<WH4994> in the wall:<WH7023> and when I had digged<WH2864> in the wall,<WH7023> behold<WH2009> a<WH259> door.<WH6607>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Go in,<WH935> and behold<WH7200> <WH853> the wicked<WH7451> abominations<WH8441> that<WH834> they<WH1992> do<WH6213> here.<WH6311>

So I went in<WH935> and saw;<WH7200> and behold<WH2009> every<WH3605> form<WH8403> of creeping things,<WH7431> and abominable<WH8263> beasts,<WH929> and all<WH3605> the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> portrayed<WH2707> upon<WH5921> the wall<WH7023> round about.<WH5439>

And there stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> them seventy<WH7657> men<WH376> of the ancients<WH4480> <WH2205> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> and in the midst<WH8432> of them stood<WH5975> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> with every man<WH376> his censer<WH4730> in his hand;<WH3027> and a thick<WH6282> cloud<WH6051> of incense<WH7004> went up.<WH5927>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> hast thou seen<WH7200> what<WH834> the ancients<WH2205> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> do<WH6213> in the dark,<WH2822> every man<WH376> in the chambers<WH2315> of his imagery?<WH4906> for<WH3588> they say,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> seeth<WH7200> us not;<WH369> the LORD<WH3068> hath forsaken<WH5800> <WH853> the earth.<WH776>
He said<WH559> also unto<WH413> me, Turn thee yet again,<WH7725> <WH5750> and thou shalt see<WH7200> greater<WH1419> abominations<WH8441> that<WH834> they<WH1992> do.<WH6213>

Then he brought<WH935> me to<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> of the LORD's<WH3068> house<WH1004> which<WH834> was toward<WH413> the north;<WH6828> and, behold,<WH2009> there<WH8033> sat<WH3427> women<WH802> weeping<WH1058> for<WH854> Tammuz.<WH8542>

Then said<WH559> he unto<WH413> me, Hast thou seen<WH7200> this, O son<WH1121> of man?<WH120> turn thee yet again,<WH7725> <WH5750> and thou shalt see<WH7200> greater<WH1419> abominations<WH8441> than these.<WH4480> <WH428>

And he brought<WH935> me into<WH413> the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> of the LORD's<WH3068> house,<WH1004> and, behold,<WH2009> at the door<WH6607> of the temple<WH1964> of the LORD,<WH3068> between<WH996> the porch<WH197> and the altar,<WH4196> were about five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> men,<WH376> with their backs<WH268> toward<WH413> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD,<WH3068> and their faces<WH6440> toward the east;<WH6924> and they<WH1992> worshiped<WH7812> the sun<WH8121> toward the east.<WH6924>

Then he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Hast thou seen<WH7200> this, O son<WH1121> of man?<WH120> Is it a light thing<WH7043> to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> that they commit<WH4480> <WH6213> <WH853> the abominations<WH8441> which<WH834> they commit<WH6213> here?<WH6311> for<WH3588> they have filled<WH4390> <WH853> the land<WH776> with violence,<WH2555> and have returned<WH7725> to provoke me to anger:<WH3707> and, lo,<WH2009> they put<WH7971> <WH853> the branch<WH2156> to<WH413> their nose.<WH639>

Therefore will I<WH589> also<WH1571> deal<WH6213> in fury:<WH2534> mine eye<WH5869> shall not<WH3808> spare,<WH2347> neither<WH3808> will I have pity:<WH2550> and though they cry<WH7121> in mine ears<WH241> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> yet will I not<WH3808> hear<WH8085> them.
